item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://bookmarkos.com - Free all-on-one bookmark manager, tab manager, and task manager in a customizable online desktop with folder collaboration.

item.title: Update GitDuck -> Duckly
item.description: https://duckly.com/ - Talk and collaborate in real-time with your team. Pair programming with any IDE, terminal sharing, voice, video and screen sharing. Free for small teams.

item.title: Add Directus — Open-Source Data Platform
item.description:
https://directus.io - Automatically generates a dynamic REST and GraphQL API for any SQL database.
https://directus.io - Headless CMS. A completely free and open-source platform for managing assets and database content on-prem or in the Cloud. No limitations or paywalls.
https://directus.io - — Directus as a service. An open-source data platform that automatically generates a dynamic REST and GraphQL API for pure SQL databases.

item.title: Update CDN information
item.description:
https://cdnjs.com/ - Simple. Fast. Reliable. Content delivery at its finest. cdnjs is a free and open-source CDN service trusted by over 11% of all websites, powered by Cloudflare.
https://www.jsdelivr.com/ - A free, fast, and reliable CDN for open source. Supports npm, GitHub, WordPress, Deno, and more.

item.title: Added 2 new services
item.description:
https://calendly.com - Calendly is the tool for connecting and scheduling meetings. Free plan provides 1 Calendar connection per user and Unlimited meetings. Desktop and Mobile apps also provided.
https://flutterflow.io - — Build your Flutter App UI without writing a single line of code. Also has a Firebase integration. Free plan includes full access to UI Builder and Free templates.

item.title: updated service description
item.description: https://thedev.id - A free thedev.id subdomain for developers.

item.title: added Statically Screenshot
item.description: https://statically.io/docs/using-screenshot/ - — A free screenshot API to convert web to image or PDF. Supports desktop and mobile view.
